doc.field: - DNC International Finance A.S. Is issuing a 10 billion yen eurobond due April 7, 1994 with a five pct coupon and priced at 102-3/8 pct, Yamaichi International (Europe) Ltd said as joint book-runner with Tokai International Ltd. The non-callable bonds, guaranteed by Den norske Creditbank, will be issued in denominations of one mln yen and will be listed in Luxembourg. Total fees of 1-7/8 pct comprise 5/8 pct for management and underwriting and 1-1/4 pct for selling. Pay date is April 7.
